parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| order by name asc
| summarize Selected = makelist(id, 10), All = makelist(id, 1000)
| mvexpand All limit 250
| project value = tostring(All), label = tostring(All), selected = iff(Selected contains All, true, false)

content.json:
# IoT/OT Threat Monitoring with Defender for IoT
---

Welcome to the IoT/OT Threat Monitoring with Defender for IoT Workbook. 
This workbook provides a guided investigation for entities based on open incidents, alerts sign-ins and activity for IT/OT assets. This workbook also provides hunting via MITRE ATT&CK for ICS, and designed to enable SecOps Analysts, Security Engineers, and MSSPs to gain situational awareness for IT/OT security posture.

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where ProviderName == "IoTSecurity"
| where Status == "New" or Status == "Active"
| where AlertSeverity == "High"
| summarize kwSum=count(TenantId)
content.title: HIGH

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where Status == "New" or Status == "Active"
| where ProviderName == "IoTSecurity"
| where AlertSeverity == "Medium"
| summarize kwSum=count(TenantId)
content.title: MEDIUM

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where AlertSeverity == "High"
| where AlertSeverity == "Low"
| summarize kwSum=count(TenantId)
content.title: LOW

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where Status == "New" or Status == "Active"
| where dayofyear(TimeGenerated) == dayofyear(now())
| summarize kwSum=count(TenantId)
content.title: NEW TODAY

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where AlertSeverity == "High"
| summarize count() by AlertName
| sort by count_ desc
| limit 250
content.title: TOP MOST ALERTS

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName contains "iot"
| where AlertSeverity == "High"
| make-series count() default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 1d by AlertName
| render timechart
content.title: TRENDING

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where Status == "New" or Status == "Active"
| where ProviderName == "IoTSecurity"
| summarize kwSum=count() by ProductComponentName
| sort by kwSum desc
content.title: ‚¨áÔ∏è SELECTOR

content.query:
let sensorengine_ = dynamic('{_sensorengine}');
SecurityAlert
| where ProviderName == "IoTSecurity"
| where Status == "New" or Status == "Active"
| where tostring(sensorengine_) has ProductComponentName or isempty(sensorengine_)
| summarize kwSum=count() by AlertSeverity
| sort by AlertSeverity asc
content.title: SEVERITY
TRENDING

content.query:
let sensorengine_ = dynamic('{_sensorengine}');
SecurityAlert 
| where ProductName == "Azure Security Center for IoT" 
| extend Category_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).Category)
| extend DeviceId_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).DeviceId)
| extend SensorId_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).SensorId)
| extend Address_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Address)
| extend Type1_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Type)
| extend DeviceId_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].DeviceId)
| extend Type2_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].IoTHub)).Type)
| extend Type3_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Type)
| extend DeviceType_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].DeviceType)
| extend Vendor_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Vendor)
| where SensorId_ <> ""
| summarize count() by SensorId_
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: SENSOR

| summarize count() by Tactic
| sort by count_ desc

SecurityAlert
| join kind=rightouter Policymap on AlertName
| where DisplayName <> ""
| extend TechniqueURL = strcat("https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Technique/",TechniqueNumber)
| where AlertName in ({AlertName})
| where Tactic in ({Tactic})
| where Technique in ({Technique})
| where TechniqueNumber in ({TechniqueNumber})
| make-series count() default=0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 1d by AlertName
| render timechart
content.title: Tactics Over Time

SecurityAlert
| join kind=rightouter Policymap on AlertName
| where DisplayName <> ""
| extend TechniqueURL = strcat("https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Technique/",TechniqueNumber)
| where AlertName in ({AlertName})
| where Tactic in ({Tactic})
| where Technique in ({Technique})
| where TechniqueNumber in ({TechniqueNumber})
| extend Category_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).Category)
| extend DeviceId_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).DeviceId)
| extend SensorId_ = tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).SensorId)
| extend Address_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Address)
| extend Type1_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Type)
| extend DeviceId_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].DeviceId)
| extend Type2_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].IoTHub)).Type)
| extend Type3_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Type)
| extend DeviceType_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].DeviceType)
| extend Vendor_ = tostring(parse_json(Entities)[0].Vendor)
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project ResourceId, Tactic, Technique, TechniqueURL, AlertName, AlertSeverity, TimeGenerated, Category_, AlertType, Status, Description, DeviceId_, SensorId_, DeviceType_, Vendor_, Address_, CompromisedEntity
| limit 250

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend ProductName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])
| where ProductName contains "iot"
 or Title contains "iot"
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0]))
